_header: All that willen of wisdom lere / Listen to me and ye shall hear
Subjects: legends; dialogues; catechisms, on science and biblical lore

BodAsh61.First Lines:

                    lereOf a tale of holy wryteSeynt Iohn þe Apostyll wytnes ite

                    blyssyng
